description: Primes p such that x^5 = 7 has no solution mod p.
comments: Complement of A040171 relative to A000040. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 18 2012
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: ok[p_]:= Reduce[Mod[x^5 - 7, p] == 0, x, Integers] == False; Select[Prime[Range[300]], ok] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 18 2012  *)
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(1500) | not exists{x : x in ResidueClassRing(p) | x^5 eq 7} ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 18 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
